TextView.android:text: 2-5 Pull Ups (b) + 15.15.15. Isometric Hold
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
5-8 Chin Ups (p) ---> 8 Chin Ups (g)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Push Ups (On the last rep, hold for 15 seconds at the top, middle and bottom positions)
x6-8 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20 seconds DeadHang Hold ---> 8 Bar Knee Raises
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Maximum Plank Hold ---> 30 Sit Ups
x4-5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 Squats ---> 20 Lunges (E/S) ---> 15 Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S) ---> 1 min Wall Sit
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 Jumping Squats ---> Broad Jumps for 45 seconds
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 Push Ups ---> 3-5 Dips ---> 10 Wide Push Ups
x6-8 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
3 Pull Ups (b) ---> 3 Chin Ups (b) ---> 5 Pull Ups (p) ---> 8 Pull Ups (g)
x5 Sets (3 to 4 mins rest inbetween sets)
30.30.30. Isometric Hold (p) ---> 15 Push Ups
x5-7 Sets (2 rest inbetween sets)
15 Sit Ups ---> 15 Roman Rwists ---> 10 Floor Leg Raises ---> 1 min Side Plank (E/S)
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Maximum Squats in 3 mins
x2 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Maximum Lunges in 3 mins
x2 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Maximum Jumping Squats in 3 mins
x2 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Maximum Jumping Lunges in 3 mins
x2 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
Optional: Choose any 4 core exercises and perform 4 sets on each one.
End of Beginner Program Level 1 - Week 4
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
It is recommended to repeat this week's routine before progressing to Week 5. If repeated, follow the same routine but increase the reps on each exercise by 20 - 30%.
